attributes.action: Completley Abolish The Unfair fuel Duty Tax On All Vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Get rid of the unfair fuel duty taxes that we all face. Think about it we have to pay VAT when we buy cars and then road TAX on the car, we then have to pay VAT on fuel and then fuel duty.This is unfair and does not help anyone.
